titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Lawrence A. Brown Papers, 1963-2004 RG.40.351
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Karen Glenn

publicationstmt.publisher: Ohio State University Libraries Special Collections

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2017-05-23T09:50-0400

did.unittitle: Lawrence A. Brown Papers

repository.corpname: Ohio State University Libraries Special Collections

did.abstract: The Lawrence A. Brown Papers contain Brown's published works and associated correspondence, mainly on urban geography research, from 1963-2004. Lawrence Brown was a professor and chair of the Department of Geography at Ohio State University.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of Materials
arrangement.p: Materials are arranged in the order received.

acqinfo.head: Acquisitions Information
acqinfo.p: Accession Number UA.2014.0228: Lawrence A. Brown, 2014

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [identification of item], Lawrence A. Brown Papers, RG 40.351, Ohio State University Archives, Ohio State University

accessrestrict.head: Access to Materials
accessrestrict.p: Materials in this collection are available for patron research, but may be used only in the University Archives Reading Room. Audiovisual materials may need a use copy produced before access is allowed. Some materials in this collection may be stored off-site, and are only available if requested 72 hours in advance of your visit. Contact the University Archives for more information.

userestrict.head: Use of Materials
userestrict.p: Materials in this collection may be protected by copyright, and are made available for research and educational purposes. In general, the OSU Libraries do not own the copyright for materials from our collections and cannot grant copyright permissions for these materials. The user is responsible for making a final determination of copyright status. If copyright protection applies, permission must be obtained from the copyright holder to reuse, publish, or reproduce the work beyond the bounds of fair use or other exceptions to the law. Works in the public domain are not protected by copyright and do not require permission to use.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Lawrence A. Brown (1935-2014) was a professor and chair of the Department of Geography at Ohio State University. His scholarship interest focused on spatial processes of innovation diffusion, migration, mobility and urban and housing developments.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Lawrence A. Brown Papers contain Brown's published works and associated correspondence, mainly on urban geography research, from 1963-2004.

defitem.label: Ohio State University Archives Biographical File

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Finding aid written by Karen Glenn, 2016 October
